document.full_text: a secretive convoy from north korea visited the northeast chinese city of changchun on saturday, before moving on in what may be ruler kim jong-il's latest trip to shore up ties with his isolated country's sole major supporter.
document.title: mystery north korean visitor in china veiled by security
lines_and_colors: a secretive convoy from north korea visited the northeast chinese city of changchun on saturday, before moving on in what may be ruler kim jong-il's latest trip to shore up ties with his isolated country's sole major supporter.
